entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Kentville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 12.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kentville AAFC 7:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: 12.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 10.9°C
Wind: S 20 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Showers at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of thundershowers overnight. Fog patches. Amount 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or freezing rain. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
